standard.name: Standard
standard.desc: The standard ruleset for all offical Smogon singles tiers (Ubers, OU, etc.)

standardnext.name: Standard NEXT
standardnext.desc: The standard ruleset for the NEXT mod

standardgbu.name: Standard GBU
standardgbu.desc: The standard ruleset for all official in-game Pokémon tournaments and Battle Spot

minimalgbu.name: Minimal GBU
minimalgbu.desc: The standard ruleset for official tournaments, but without Restricted Legendary bans

standarddoubles.name: Standard Doubles
standarddoubles.desc: The standard ruleset for all official Smogon doubles tiers

pokemon.name: Pokemon
pokemon.desc: Applies the basic limitations of pokemon games: level 100, 6 pokemon, 4 moves, no CAP, no future-gen pokemon/moves/etc - but does not include illegal move/ability validation

hoennpokedex.name: Hoenn Pokedex
hoennpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Hoenn region (OR/AS)

sinnohpokedex.name: Sinnoh Pokedex
sinnohpokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Sinnoh region (Platinum)

kalospokedex.name: Kalos Pokedex
kalospokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Kalos region (XY)

alolapokedex.name: Alola Pokedex
alolapokedex.desc: Only allows Pokémon native to the Alola region (US/UM)

teampreview.name: Team Preview
teampreview.desc: Allows each player to see the Pokémon on their opponent's team before they choose their lead Pokémon

littlecup.name: Little Cup
littlecup.desc: Only allows Pokémon that can evolve and don't have any prior evolutions

speciesclause.name: Species Clause
speciesclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon from the same species

nicknameclause.name: Nickname Clause
nicknameclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon with the same nickname

itemclause.name: Item Clause
itemclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than one Pokémon with the same item

abilityclause.name: Ability Clause
abilityclause.desc: Prevents teams from having more than two Pokémon with the same ability

ohkoclause.name: OHKO Clause
ohkoclause.desc: Bans all OHKO moves, such as Fissure

evasionabilitiesclause.name: Evasion Abilities Clause
evasionabilitiesclause.desc: Bans abilities that boost Evasion under certain weather conditions

evasionmovesclause.name: Evasion Moves Clause
evasionmovesclause.desc: Bans moves that consistently raise the user's evasion when used

accuracymovesclause.name: Accuracy Moves Clause
accuracymovesclause.desc: Bans moves that have a chance to lower the target's accuracy when used

endlessbattleclause.name: Endless Battle Clause
endlessbattleclause.desc: Prevents players from forcing a battle which their opponent cannot end except by forfeit

batonpassclause.name: Baton Pass Clause
batonpassclause.desc: Stops teams from having more than one Pokémon with Baton Pass, and no Pokémon may be capable of passing boosts to both Speed and another stat

cfzclause.name: CFZ Clause
cfzclause.desc: Bans the use of crystal-free Z-Moves

hppercentagemod.name: HP Percentage Mod
hppercentagemod.desc: Shows the HP of Pokémon in percentages

exacthpmod.name: Exact HP Mod
exacthpmod.desc: Shows the exact HP of all Pokémon

cancelmod.name: Cancel Mod
cancelmod.desc: Allows players to change their own choices before their opponents make one

sleepclausemod.name: Sleep Clause Mod
sleepclausemod.desc: Prevents players from putting more than one of their opponent's Pokémon to sleep at a time, and bans Mega Gengar from using Hypnosis

switchpriorityclausemod.name: Switch Priority Clause Mod
switchpriorityclausemod.desc: Makes a faster Pokémon switch first when double-switching, unlike in Emerald link battles, where player 1's Pokémon would switch first

freezeclausemod.name: Freeze Clause Mod
freezeclausemod.desc: Prevents players from freezing more than one of their opponent's Pokémon at a time

sametypeclause.name: Same Type Clause
sametypeclause.desc: Forces all Pokémon on a team to share a type with each other

arceusevclause.name: Arceus EV Clause
arceusevclause.desc: Restricts Arceus to a maximum of 100 EVs in any one stat

inversemod.name: Inverse Mod
inversemod.desc: The mod for Inverse Battle which inverts the type effectiveness chart, swapping resistances and weaknesses with each other

ignoreillegalabilities.name: Ignore Illegal Abilities
ignoreillegalabilities.desc: Allows Pokémon to use any ability

stabmonsmovelegality.name: STABmons Move Legality
stabmonsmovelegality.desc: Allows Pokémon to use any move that they or a previous evolution/out-of-battle forme share a type with

allowcap.name: Allow CAP
allowcap.desc: Allows the use of Pokémon, abilities, moves, and items made by the Create-A-Pokémon project

allowtradeback.name: Allow Tradeback
allowtradeback.desc: Allows Gen 1 pokemon to have moves from their Gen 2 learnsets

allowavs.name: Allow AVs
allowavs.desc: Tells formats with the 'letsgo' mod to take Awakening Values into consideration when calculating stats
